item.title: 北歐行程 (2025-04-24 ~ 2025-05-03)
item.description: Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun 4/23 TPE → 4/24 MUC → HAM 4/25 Hamburg 4/26 Hamburg → Copenhagen 4/27 Copenhagen 4/28 Copenhagen 4/29 Copenhangen → Stockholm 4/30 Stockholm 5/1 Stockholm 5/2 HAM → MUC 5/3 MUC → 5/4 TPE Hamburg Itinerary (2025-04-24 ~ 2025-04-26) Base Hotel: The Fontenay Hamburg Day 1 - 2025-04-24 (Thu) | Arrival & City Walk 10 - 17°C, 多雲 搭 S1 從 HAM 直達 Jungfernstieg, 30 min; Jungfernstieg 走路 20 min 至 Fontenay.
